name: @tenoxui/property
description: Default types and properties for tenoxui css framework.

scripts.build: terser -o dist/umd/property.umd.min.js dist/umd/property.umd.js -m --source-map url='property.umd.min.js.map' && terser -o dist/esm/property.esm.min.js dist/esm/property.esm.js -m --source-map url='property.esm.min.js.map'

author: NOuSantx
